question.name: nuts
question.question-text:
In an average week, how many servings of peanut butter or nuts (like peanuts, almond, pecans, walnuts, or cashews) do you usually eat?
Would you say:

question.name: butter
question.question-text:
What type of butter or margarine do you usually use?
Is it:

options.option: Tub margarine or other trans-fat free
